recommendations: Priyadarshi Soumya Prakash ‚ÄúI had the pleasure of working with Priyambada during my MBA stint, and I can confidently say that she is one of the most talented and dedicated individuals I have had the opportunity to collaborate with. Throughout our time working together on several projects, I was consistently impressed by her ability to come up with creative solutions to complex problems. Her out-of-the-box thinking and ability to think strategically helped our team to come up with innovative ideas that set us apart from our peers. Not only was she an asset when it came to the creative aspects of our projects, but she was also incredibly dependable and hard-working. She consistently went above and beyond to ensure that our team was on track to meet our deadlines and goals. Her ability to manage her time effectively and her willingness to help her teammates were invaluable to our team's success. In addition to her work ethic, Priyambada is a great communicator and team player. She was always willing to lend a helping hand to her teammates, and her ability to collaborate effectively made her an integral part of our team. Her ability to communicate her ideas clearly and effectively helped to ensure that our team was always on the same page. I would highly recommend her for any project or opportunity that requires a combination of strategic thinking and hard work. She will be a valuable asset to any team she joins.‚Äù

Navin Rohilla ‚ÄúPriyambada has led large scale projects of compliance transformation for India's Ola car and bike business. She has played pivotal role in getting aggregator licenses for Ola in many states in India. She has exceptional stakeholders management skills. She is intelligent , focused and very obsessively diligent. She is a good friend and colleague, whom all people like working with. Blessed with a very good problem-solving aptitude and hard-earned skill-set, She would surely be an asset to any organization. Wish her all the best in all his future endeavours‚Äù

recommendations: Priyadarshi Soumya Prakash ‚ÄúI had the pleasure of working with Priyambada during my MBA stint, and I can confidently say that she is one of the most talented and dedicated individuals I have had the opportunity to collaborate with. Throughout our time working together on several projects, I was consistently impressed by her ability to come up with creative solutions to complex problems. Her out-of-the-box thinking and ability to think strategically helped our team to come up with innovative ideas that set us apart from our peers. Not only was she an asset when it came to the creative aspects of our projects, but she was also incredibly dependable and hard-working. She consistently went above and beyond to ensure that our team was on track to meet our deadlines and goals. Her ability to manage her time effectively and her willingness to help her teammates were invaluable to our team's success. In addition to her work ethic, Priyambada is a great communicator and team player. She was always willing to lend a helping hand to her teammates, and her ability to collaborate effectively made her an integral part of our team. Her ability to communicate her ideas clearly and effectively helped to ensure that our team was always on the same page. I would highly recommend her for any project or opportunity that requires a combination of strategic thinking and hard work. She will be a valuable asset to any team she joins.‚Äù

Navin Rohilla ‚ÄúPriyambada has led large scale projects of compliance transformation for India's Ola car and bike business. She has played pivotal role in getting aggregator licenses for Ola in many states in India. She has exceptional stakeholders management skills. She is intelligent , focused and very obsessively diligent. She is a good friend and colleague, whom all people like working with. Blessed with a very good problem-solving aptitude and hard-earned skill-set, She would surely be an asset to any organization. Wish her all the best in all his future endeavours‚Äù

detailed_profile.about: Fashion professional with a strong focus on craftsmanship, quality, and production excellence. Experienced in luxury ready-to-wear across womenswear, menswear, and childrenswear, as well as in the premium product segment for accessories and footwear. Experienced in working with premium materials including denim, knitted and woven fabrics, and leather. Specialties include quality control, risk assessment, production, and brand management, with a consistent track record of upholding the highest standards throughout the product lifecycle. A graduate of Istituto Marangoni Paris, and well-versed in navigating fast-paced, high-performance environments where precision and innovation are key. Open to forward-thinking collaborations and opportunities that elevate fashion, materials, and craftsmanship.

experience.title: Normes and Quality assistant (PAP)
experience.description: ‚Ä¢ Coordinating with suppliers and external laboratories throughout the testing process for ready-to-wear garments and raw materials‚Ä¢ Defining appropriate test protocols and overseeing the dispatch of samples to accredited labs‚Ä¢Handling region-specific testing standards and documentation, including GB standards for China, CPSIA and CPSC requirements for the U.S., and country-specific protocols for European and other markets‚Ä¢ Reviewing and managing inspection reports through the QIMA platform, with a focus on final production inspections prior to shipment‚Ä¢ Validating care labels as per specific  style, ensuring regulatory compliance and accuracy before the start of garment production‚Ä¢ Managing documentation workflows: archiving test reports, compliance records, and maintaining detailed tracking tools‚Ä¢ Handling non-conformities by initiating corrective actions in collaboration with the logistics and purchasing teams‚Ä¢ Serving as the quality liaison for multiple product categories, including Accessories, Shoes, Woven and Knitwear, Toys etc
experience.description_html:
• Coordinating with suppliers and external laboratories throughout the testing process for ready-to-wear garments and raw materials

• Defining appropriate test protocols and overseeing the dispatch of samples to accredited labs

•Handling region-specific testing standards and documentation, including GB standards for China, CPSIA and CPSC requirements for the U.S., and country-specific protocols for European and other markets

• Reviewing and managing inspection reports through the QIMA platform, with a focus on final production inspections prior to shipment

• Validating care labels as per specific style, ensuring regulatory compliance and accuracy before the start of garment production

• Managing documentation workflows: archiving test reports, compliance records, and maintaining detailed tracking tools

• Handling non-conformities by initiating corrective actions in collaboration with the logistics and purchasing teams

• Serving as the quality liaison for multiple product categories, including Accessories, Shoes, Woven and Knitwear, Toys etc

experience.title: Production Intern

experience.description_html:
• Managed order fulfillment with accuracy, ensuring timely deliveries and customer satisfaction.
• Processed client returns efficiently while upholding brand standards.
• Conducted quality control on luxury leather and shearling goods to maintain excellence.
• Coordinated with the Paris atelier to support production and ensure smooth workflow.

experience.title: Raw Materials and Components Quality Assitant (PAP)
experience.description: ‚Ä¢	Launched and monitored fabric and thermo laboratory tests in collaboration with suppliers to ensure compliance with quality standards.	‚Ä¢	Managed industrialization approval for fabrics, PAP components, and finished products across both collection and production stages.	‚Ä¢	Assessed fabrics using Codetex to identify potential quality risks, optimizing material utilization and reducing excess inventory in coordination with production and purchasing teams.	‚Ä¢	Maintained detailed records of fabric specifications, sourcing details, and supplier agreements in compliance with AGEC regulations.	‚Ä¢	Coordinated with suppliers to address quality issues, ensuring materials met Balmain‚Äôs stringent standards.        ‚Ä¢ Ensured compliance with global testing regulations, overseeing material certification and safety standards based on regional requirements.	‚Ä¢	Assisted in developing sustainable sourcing strategies by evaluating material performance and environmental impact.	‚Ä¢	Supported cross-functional teams by providing technical insights on fabric properties, durability, and production feasibility.
experience.description_html:
• Launched and monitored fabric and thermo laboratory tests in collaboration with suppliers to ensure compliance with quality standards.

• Managed industrialization approval for fabrics, PAP components, and finished products across both collection and production stages.

• Assessed fabrics using Codetex to identify potential quality risks, optimizing material utilization and reducing excess inventory in coordination with production and purchasing teams.

• Maintained detailed records of fabric specifications, sourcing details, and supplier agreements in compliance with AGEC regulations.

• Coordinated with suppliers to address quality issues, ensuring materials met Balmain’s stringent standards.

• Ensured compliance with global testing regulations, overseeing material certification and safety standards based on regional requirements.

• Assisted in developing sustainable sourcing strategies by evaluating material performance and environmental impact.

detailed_profile.name: Hitesh Nagrani
detailed_profile.position: Senior Director Of Technology, Publicis Sapient | Applying modern engineering practices to transform Financial Service firms
detailed_profile.about: Hitesh has more than 24 years of experience in enterprise application architecture, driving technical delivery, and leading large engineering teams. He has over 16 years of experience in the Financial Services Industry (FSI), including retail and SME banking, capital markets, and commodities. Hitesh is a dynamic leader at Publicis Sapient FSI, with hands-on experience in launching a cloud-native, digital-only Neobank in just 6-9 months. He spearheaded the transformation of a UK savings bank from a legacy on-premises application to a modern core banking application, supported by top Fintechs, to deliver seamless customer journeys and core banking transformation. He is a modern engineering practitioner who promotes evolutionary architecture and modern engineering practices and has a track record of building large engineering teams to execute large and complex digital transformations.

recommendations: Priyadarshi Soumya Prakash ‚ÄúI had the pleasure of working with Priyambada during my MBA stint, and I can confidently say that she is one of the most talented and dedicated individuals I have had the opportunity to collaborate with. Throughout our time working together on several projects, I was consistently impressed by her ability to come up with creative solutions to complex problems. Her out-of-the-box thinking and ability to think strategically helped our team to come up with innovative ideas that set us apart from our peers. Not only was she an asset when it came to the creative aspects of our projects, but she was also incredibly dependable and hard-working. She consistently went above and beyond to ensure that our team was on track to meet our deadlines and goals. Her ability to manage her time effectively and her willingness to help her teammates were invaluable to our team's success. In addition to her work ethic, Priyambada is a great communicator and team player. She was always willing to lend a helping hand to her teammates, and her ability to collaborate effectively made her an integral part of our team. Her ability to communicate her ideas clearly and effectively helped to ensure that our team was always on the same page. I would highly recommend her for any project or opportunity that requires a combination of strategic thinking and hard work. She will be a valuable asset to any team she joins.‚Äù

Navin Rohilla ‚ÄúPriyambada has led large scale projects of compliance transformation for India's Ola car and bike business. She has played pivotal role in getting aggregator licenses for Ola in many states in India. She has exceptional stakeholders management skills. She is intelligent , focused and very obsessively diligent. She is a good friend and colleague, whom all people like working with. Blessed with a very good problem-solving aptitude and hard-earned skill-set, She would surely be an asset to any organization. Wish her all the best in all his future endeavours‚Äù

detailed_profile.name: Hitesh Nagrani
detailed_profile.position: Senior Director Of Technology, Publicis Sapient | Applying modern engineering practices to transform Financial Service firms
detailed_profile.about: Hitesh has more than 24 years of experience in enterprise application architecture, driving technical delivery, and leading large engineering teams. He has over 16 years of experience in the Financial Services Industry (FSI), including retail and SME banking, capital markets, and commodities. Hitesh is a dynamic leader at Publicis Sapient FSI, with hands-on experience in launching a cloud-native, digital-only Neobank in just 6-9 months. He spearheaded the transformation of a UK savings bank from a legacy on-premises application to a modern core banking application, supported by top Fintechs, to deliver seamless customer journeys and core banking transformation. He is a modern engineering practitioner who promotes evolutionary architecture and modern engineering practices and has a track record of building large engineering teams to execute large and complex digital transformations.

Her out-of-the-box thinking and ability to think strategically helped our team to come up with innovative ideas that set us apart from our peers. Not only was she an asset when it came to the creative aspects of our projects, but she was also incredibly dependable and hard-working. She consistently went above and beyond to ensure that our team was on track to meet our deadlines and goals. Her ability to manage her time effectively and her willingness to help her teammates were invaluable to our team's success. In addition to her work ethic, Priyambada is a great communicator and team player. She was always willing to lend a helping hand to her teammates, and her ability to collaborate effectively made her an integral part of our team. Her ability to communicate her ideas clearly and effectively helped to ensure that our team was always on the same page. I would highly recommend her for any project or opportunity that requires a combination of strategic thinking and hard work. She will be a valuable asset to any team she joins.‚Äù

Navin Rohilla ‚ÄúPriyambada has led large scale projects of compliance transformation for India's Ola car and bike business. She is intelligent , focused and very obsessively diligent. She is a good friend and colleague, whom all people like working with. Blessed with a very good problem-solving aptitude and hard-earned skill-set, She would surely be an asset to any organization. Wish her all the best in all his future endeavours‚Äù

detailed_profile.about: At Opera, our team is at the forefront of understanding user behaviors, transforming complex data into strategic insights. My analytical skills and proficiency in Adobe Photoshop reflect a commitment to delivering excellence across diverse technological and artistic fields. Always exploring new technologies, including AI, I strive to future-proof operations and create impactful solutions.

detailed_profile.name: Akshat Jain
detailed_profile.position: Market Research Analyst @ Opera | Business Analytics | AI Research | Global Shaper | Perplexity AI Fellow
detailed_profile.about: At Opera, our team is at the forefront of understanding user behaviors, transforming complex data into strategic insights. As a Market Research Analyst, I apply my current Business Analytics studies to enhance our approach to data, focusing on deeper user understanding. My previous roles at Norsk Hydro and Antler sharpened my problem-solving skills, empowering me to create predictive trading models and identify start-up potential. With sustainability at my core, I pursue impactful change through my academic and professional journey, underscored by my Climate Reality Leader certification.

experience.title: Market Research Analyst
experience.description: ‚Ä¢ Conducted Qualitative and Quantitative user research for Opera's Flagship product.‚Ä¢ Led Market Research on AI competition for Opera.‚Ä¢ Analyzed user preferences and behaviors to understand why users prefer Opera over other browsers, increasing data collection by 500%.‚Ä¢ Developed and implemented data models and analysis using Python to gain actionable user insights.
experience.description_html:
• Conducted Qualitative and Quantitative user research for Opera's Flagship product.
• Led Market Research on AI competition for Opera.
• Analyzed user preferences and behaviors to understand why users prefer Opera over other browsers, increasing data collection by 500%.
• Developed and implemented data models and analysis using Python to gain actionable user insights.

detailed_profile.name: Hitesh Nagrani
detailed_profile.position: Senior Director Of Technology, Publicis Sapient | Applying modern engineering practices to transform Financial Service firms
detailed_profile.about: Hitesh has more than 24 years of experience in enterprise application architecture, driving technical delivery, and leading large engineering teams. He has over 16 years of experience in the Financial Services Industry (FSI), including retail and SME banking, capital markets, and commodities. Hitesh is a dynamic leader at Publicis Sapient FSI, with hands-on experience in launching a cloud-native, digital-only Neobank in just 6-9 months. He spearheaded the transformation of a UK savings bank from a legacy on-premises application to a modern core banking application, supported by top Fintechs, to deliver seamless customer journeys and core banking transformation. He is a modern engineering practitioner who promotes evolutionary architecture and modern engineering practices and has a track record of building large engineering teams to execute large and complex digital transformations.

recommendations: Priyadarshi Soumya Prakash ‚ÄúI had the pleasure of working with Priyambada during my MBA stint, and I can confidently say that she is one of the most talented and dedicated individuals I have had the opportunity to collaborate with. Throughout our time working together on several projects, I was consistently impressed by her ability to come up with creative solutions to complex problems. Her out-of-the-box thinking and ability to think strategically helped our team to come up with innovative ideas that set us apart from our peers. Not only was she an asset when it came to the creative aspects of our projects, but she was also incredibly dependable and hard-working. She consistently went above and beyond to ensure that our team was on track to meet our deadlines and goals. Her ability to manage her time effectively and her willingness to help her teammates were invaluable to our team's success. In addition to her work ethic, Priyambada is a great communicator and team player. She was always willing to lend a helping hand to her teammates, and her ability to collaborate effectively made her an integral part of our team. Her ability to communicate her ideas clearly and effectively helped to ensure that our team was always on the same page. I would highly recommend her for any project or opportunity that requires a combination of strategic thinking and hard work. She will be a valuable asset to any team she joins.‚Äù

Navin Rohilla ‚ÄúPriyambada has led large scale projects of compliance transformation for India's Ola car and bike business. She has played pivotal role in getting aggregator licenses for Ola in many states in India. She has exceptional stakeholders management skills. She is intelligent , focused and very obsessively diligent. She is a good friend and colleague, whom all people like working with. Blessed with a very good problem-solving aptitude and hard-earned skill-set, She would surely be an asset to any organization. Wish her all the best in all his future endeavours‚Äù

detailed_profile.position: Warehouse Executive | Specialist in Digitalization, Process Optimization & Operational Efficiency | 17 Years of Expertise in Tech & Creative Services | Driving Innovation & Future Ready Solution
detailed_profile.about: Passionate and results-driven professional with expertise in warehouse operations, digitalization, and process optimization. At ZF Aftermarket, I lead the warehouse management team, driving efficiency, enhancing traceability, and ensuring operational KPIs are met in a dynamic e-commerce environment. With a strong foundation in stakeholder management, workflow standardization, and team leadership, I am committed to continuous improvement and innovation. Beyond logistics, I bring 17 years of entrepreneurial experience in tech and creative services, combining IT maintenance with professional graphic design. My analytical skills and proficiency in Adobe Photoshop reflect a commitment to delivering excellence across diverse technological and artistic fields. Always exploring new technologies, including AI, I strive to future-proof operations and create impactful solutions.

recommendations: Priyadarshi Soumya Prakash ‚ÄúI had the pleasure of working with Priyambada during my MBA stint, and I can confidently say that she is one of the most talented and dedicated individuals I have had the opportunity to collaborate with. Throughout our time working together on several projects, I was consistently impressed by her ability to come up with creative solutions to complex problems. Her out-of-the-box thinking and ability to think strategically helped our team to come up with innovative ideas that set us apart from our peers. Not only was she an asset when it came to the creative aspects of our projects, but she was also incredibly dependable and hard-working. She consistently went above and beyond to ensure that our team was on track to meet our deadlines and goals. Her ability to manage her time effectively and her willingness to help her teammates were invaluable to our team's success. In addition to her work ethic, Priyambada is a great communicator and team player. She was always willing to lend a helping hand to her teammates, and her ability to collaborate effectively made her an integral part of our team. Blessed with a very good problem-solving aptitude and hard-earned skill-set, She would surely be an asset to any organization. Wish her all the best in all his future endeavours‚Äù

recommendations: Priyadarshi Soumya Prakash ‚ÄúI had the pleasure of working with Priyambada during my MBA stint, and I can confidently say that she is one of the most talented and dedicated individuals I have had the opportunity to collaborate with. Throughout our time working together on several projects, I was consistently impressed by her ability to come up with creative solutions to complex problems. Her out-of-the-box thinking and ability to think strategically helped our team to come up with innovative ideas that set us apart from our peers. Not only was she an asset when it came to the creative aspects of our projects, but she was also incredibly dependable and hard-working. She consistently went above and beyond to ensure that our team was on track to meet our deadlines and goals. Her ability to manage her time effectively and her willingness to help her teammates were invaluable to our team's success. In addition to her work ethic, Priyambada is a great communicator and team player. She was always willing to lend a helping hand to her teammates, and her ability to collaborate effectively made her an integral part of our team. Her ability to communicate her ideas clearly and effectively helped to ensure that our team was always on the same page. I would highly recommend her for any project or opportunity that requires a combination of strategic thinking and hard work. She will be a valuable asset to any team she joins.‚Äù

Navin Rohilla ‚ÄúPriyambada has led large scale projects of compliance transformation for India's Ola car and bike business. She is intelligent , focused and very obsessively diligent. She is a good friend and colleague, whom all people like working with. Blessed with a very good problem-solving aptitude and hard-earned skill-set, She would surely be an asset to any organization. Wish her all the best in all his future endeavours‚Äù

detailed_profile.position: Market Research Analyst @ Opera | Business Analytics | AI Research | Global Shaper | Perplexity AI Fellow
detailed_profile.about: At Opera, our team is at the forefront of understanding user behaviors, transforming complex data into strategic insights. As a Market Research Analyst, I apply my current Business Analytics studies to enhance our approach to data, focusing on deeper user understanding. My previous roles at Norsk Hydro and Antler sharpened my problem-solving skills, empowering me to create predictive trading models and identify start-up potential. With sustainability at my core, I pursue impactful change through my academic and professional journey, underscored by my Climate Reality Leader certification.

detailed_profile.about: At Opera, our team is at the forefront of understanding user behaviors, transforming complex data into strategic insights. As a Market Research Analyst, I apply my current Business Analytics studies to enhance our approach to data, focusing on deeper user understanding. My previous roles at Norsk Hydro and Antler sharpened my problem-solving skills, empowering me to create predictive trading models and identify start-up potential. With sustainability at my core, I pursue impactful change through my academic and professional journey, underscored by my Climate Reality Leader certification.

As a Market Research Analyst, I apply my current Business Analytics studies to enhance our approach to data, focusing on deeper user understanding. My previous roles at Norsk Hydro and Antler sharpened my problem-solving skills, empowering me to create predictive trading models and identify start-up potential. With sustainability at my core, I pursue impactful change through my academic and professional journey, underscored by my Climate Reality Leader certification.

experience.title: Market Research Analyst

experience.description_html:
• Conducted Qualitative and Quantitative user research for Opera's Flagship product.
• Led Market Research on AI competition for Opera.
• Analyzed user preferences and behaviors to understand why users prefer Opera over other browsers, increasing data collection by 500%.
• Developed and implemented data models and analysis using Python to gain actionable user insights.

detailed_profile.name: Gowtham .R
detailed_profile.position: Warehouse Executive | Specialist in Digitalization, Process Optimization & Operational Efficiency | 17 Years of Expertise in Tech & Creative Services | Driving Innovation & Future Ready Solution
detailed_profile.about: Passionate and results-driven professional with expertise in warehouse operations, digitalization, and process optimization. At ZF Aftermarket, I lead the warehouse management team, driving efficiency, enhancing traceability, and ensuring operational KPIs are met in a dynamic e-commerce environment. With a strong foundation in stakeholder management, workflow standardization, and team leadership, I am committed to continuous improvement and innovation. Beyond logistics, I bring 17 years of entrepreneurial experience in tech and creative services, combining IT maintenance with professional graphic design. My analytical skills and proficiency in Adobe Photoshop reflect a commitment to delivering excellence across diverse technological and artistic fields. Always exploring new technologies, including AI, I strive to future-proof operations and create impactful solutions.

detailed_profile.about: At Opera, our team is at the forefront of understanding user behaviors, transforming complex data into strategic insights. As a Market Research Analyst, I apply my current Business Analytics studies to enhance our approach to data, focusing on deeper user understanding. My previous roles at Norsk Hydro and Antler sharpened my problem-solving skills, empowering me to create predictive trading models and identify start-up potential. With sustainability at my core, I pursue impactful change through my academic and professional journey, underscored by my Climate Reality Leader certification.

My previous roles at Norsk Hydro and Antler sharpened my problem-solving skills, empowering me to create predictive trading models and identify start-up potential. With sustainability at my core, I pursue impactful change through my academic and professional journey, underscored by my Climate Reality Leader certification.

recommendations: Priyadarshi Soumya Prakash ‚ÄúI had the pleasure of working with Priyambada during my MBA stint, and I can confidently say that she is one of the most talented and dedicated individuals I have had the opportunity to collaborate with. Throughout our time working together on several projects, I was consistently impressed by her ability to come up with creative solutions to complex problems. Her out-of-the-box thinking and ability to think strategically helped our team to come up with innovative ideas that set us apart from our peers. Not only was she an asset when it came to the creative aspects of our projects, but she was also incredibly dependable and hard-working. She consistently went above and beyond to ensure that our team was on track to meet our deadlines and goals. Her ability to manage her time effectively and her willingness to help her teammates were invaluable to our team's success. In addition to her work ethic, Priyambada is a great communicator and team player. She was always willing to lend a helping hand to her teammates, and her ability to collaborate effectively made her an integral part of our team. Her ability to communicate her ideas clearly and effectively helped to ensure that our team was always on the same page. I would highly recommend her for any project or opportunity that requires a combination of strategic thinking and hard work. She will be a valuable asset to any team she joins.‚Äù

Blessed with a very good problem-solving aptitude and hard-earned skill-set, She would surely be an asset to any organization. Wish her all the best in all his future endeavours‚Äù

recommendations: Hasanur Rahman ‚ÄúI closely worked with Karthik for about 3 years during 2016-18 for Infosys Finacle Migration Project. This core banking migration was declared one of the smoothest CBS migration of Infosys with huge numbers of customisation. Moreover, Karthik received Award from Bank for the successful migration of the project. The project management best practices were practiced methodically under the leadership of Karthik, he handle all internal & external staleholders very carefully, handled all change management & ensure delivery, achives all milestones for the project. About 300 people worked dedicated in the project and about 4000 people worked indirectly in the project covering UAT, Load testing etc milestones. Apart from understanding Core Banking and a senior project management expert, Karthik is very good human being, a good friend, has value for & easily adopt different cultures. Any employer would be beneficial from him if he is recruited.‚Äù

experience.description_html:
Key Responsibilities

1. Develop strong customer relationships and help them with a variety of tasks and tools, including email, phone, and online presentations, in-person meetings or video chat in order to generate high volume of prospective clients.
2. Forecast and track important metrics and help onboard new clients by working closely with the sales team.
3. Work alongside clients on their marketing programmes and oversee implementation of all activity.
4. Reporting weekly/monthly/quarterly on agency activity keeping management teams up to speed on performance.
5. Create an inspiring team environment with an open communication culture and motivate them.
6. Set clear team goals, delegate tasks and set deadlines.
7. Listen to team members’ feedback and resolve any issues or conflicts.

recommendations: Hasanur Rahman ‚ÄúI closely worked with Karthik for about 3 years during 2016-18 for Infosys Finacle Migration Project. Karthik was responsible for overall project management & ensuring delivery from Infosys side where I was Program Head from Bank Side. This was the largest project of BRAC Bank's history, the project was very successful, meet the goal of the overall transformation initiatives of the Bank. This core banking migration was declared one of the smoothest CBS migration of Infosys with huge numbers of customisation. Moreover, Karthik received Award from Bank for the successful migration of the project. The project management best practices were practiced methodically under the leadership of Karthik, he handle all internal & external staleholders very carefully, handled all change management & ensure delivery, achives all milestones for the project. About 300 people worked dedicated in the project and about 4000 people worked indirectly in the project covering UAT, Load testing etc milestones. Apart from understanding Core Banking and a senior project management expert, Karthik is very good human being, a good friend, has value for & easily adopt different cultures. Any employer would be beneficial from him if he is recruited.‚Äù

recommendations: Priyadarshi Soumya Prakash ‚ÄúI had the pleasure of working with Priyambada during my MBA stint, and I can confidently say that she is one of the most talented and dedicated individuals I have had the opportunity to collaborate with. Throughout our time working together on several projects, I was consistently impressed by her ability to come up with creative solutions to complex problems. Her out-of-the-box thinking and ability to think strategically helped our team to come up with innovative ideas that set us apart from our peers. Not only was she an asset when it came to the creative aspects of our projects, but she was also incredibly dependable and hard-working. She consistently went above and beyond to ensure that our team was on track to meet our deadlines and goals. Her ability to manage her time effectively and her willingness to help her teammates were invaluable to our team's success. In addition to her work ethic, Priyambada is a great communicator and team player. She was always willing to lend a helping hand to her teammates, and her ability to collaborate effectively made her an integral part of our team. Her ability to communicate her ideas clearly and effectively helped to ensure that our team was always on the same page. I would highly recommend her for any project or opportunity that requires a combination of strategic thinking and hard work. She will be a valuable asset to any team she joins.‚Äù

Navin Rohilla ‚ÄúPriyambada has led large scale projects of compliance transformation for India's Ola car and bike business. She has played pivotal role in getting aggregator licenses for Ola in many states in India. She has exceptional stakeholders management skills. She is intelligent , focused and very obsessively diligent. She is a good friend and colleague, whom all people like working with. Blessed with a very good problem-solving aptitude and hard-earned skill-set, She would surely be an asset to any organization. Wish her all the best in all his future endeavours‚Äù

Not only was she an asset when it came to the creative aspects of our projects, but she was also incredibly dependable and hard-working. She consistently went above and beyond to ensure that our team was on track to meet our deadlines and goals. Her ability to manage her time effectively and her willingness to help her teammates were invaluable to our team's success. In addition to her work ethic, Priyambada is a great communicator and team player. She was always willing to lend a helping hand to her teammates, and her ability to collaborate effectively made her an integral part of our team. Blessed with a very good problem-solving aptitude and hard-earned skill-set, She would surely be an asset to any organization. Wish her all the best in all his future endeavours‚Äù

detailed_profile.about: At Opera, our team is at the forefront of understanding user behaviors, transforming complex data into strategic insights. As a Market Research Analyst, I apply my current Business Analytics studies to enhance our approach to data, focusing on deeper user understanding. My previous roles at Norsk Hydro and Antler sharpened my problem-solving skills, empowering me to create predictive trading models and identify start-up potential. With sustainability at my core, I pursue impactful change through my academic and professional journey, underscored by my Climate Reality Leader certification.
